name: King of the Ring: Punch your way to the top
blurb: Take gaming to the next level. Use your fists to fight for the title in this competitive, next-generation arcade game.

rewards.reward: KING OF THE RING INTERNATIONAL: Be part of the movement to bring King of the Ring to the FIRST country outside of the U.S. All you have to do is pledge $1 and vote for the country of your choice in our Backer Survey at the end of our project and we will bring King of the Ring to the country with the most votes!

AMATEUR FIGHTERS: Be a part of creating the first Nexersys arcade game! Receive 5 FREE plays on ALL King of the Ring games for 2 years. We project to have up to 4,000 units in bars & arcades over the next 24 months - that means up to 20,000+ FREE play credits! Take a King of the Ring Tour across the nation and play on each and every King of the Ring game, or GIFT, TRADE and SELL your credits to other gamers. The choice is yours! We will provide you with codes that are valid for 5 credits on EVERY unit for up to 2 years.

PRO FIGHTERS: Receive 10 FREE plays on ALL King of the Ring games for 2 years. We project to have up to 4,000 units in bars & arcades over the next 24 months - that means up to 40,000+ FREE play credits! Take a King of the Ring Tour across the nation and play on each and every King of the Ring game, or GIFT, TRADE and SELL your credits to other gamers. The choice is yours! We will provide you with codes that are valid for 10 credits on EVERY unit for up to 2 years.

FOUNDERS: Join the movement and receive a Founding Membership to the future King of the Ring interactive online community and exclusive video and photo updates throughout the project. What is this community, you ask? The King of the Ring Community will feature worldwide leader boards, game rankings, and contests AND allows you to stay up to date with the latest King of the Ring news. Also, receive 10 FREE plays on ALL King of the Ring games for 2 years. We project to have up to 4,000 units in bars & arcades over the next 24 months - that means up to 40,000+ FREE play credits!

TRAINERS: Receive a pair of your very own Nexersys Gloves! This is what YOU need to be King of the Ring! A good pair of gloves helps you deliver a powerful punch. Made from top-grade leather and high-quality foam, they're the only gloves you'll ever need to compete. Also, receive 10 FREE plays on ALL King of the Ring games for up to 2 years! We project to have up to 4,000 units in bars & arcades over the next 24 months - that means up to 40,000+ FREE play credits!

ICONS: Receive a Founding Membership icon that will be featured on the future King of the Ring interactive online community including leader boards. Show the world you are a part of the movement! Receive 10 FREE plays on ALL King of the Ring games for 2 years. We project to have up to 4,000 units in bars & arcades over the next 24 months - that means up to 40,000+ FREE play credits! Also receive exclusive video and photo updates throughout the project.

SPONSORS: We will feature an image or advertisement of your choice in King of the Ring! Offer includes placement  on a fighter's shorts with placement for up to 2 years. Act fast if you want in on this one!

AVATARS: Assist the Nexersys Development team in creating your own Avatar Fighter for the King of the Ring game in your likeness! Only 10 available so act fast! How often do you get the opportunity to create a game character that looks like you? Now\u2019s your time to shine!

OWNERS: Get your very own King of the Ring arcade game for your home, bar, restaurant or arcade! Be one of the first to own and enjoy a King of the Ring game. You\u2019ll never have to leave your house again with the most interactive and fun arcade game out there right under your own roof! (Ok, you may have to leave for food occasionally, but you get the point)

TITLE SPONSOR: Be the one and only TITLE sponsor of the MMA Cage for 1 year! We will put your logo in the center of the MMA Cage, promoting your company to all players, just like the big companies in major PPV and Cable televised boxing matches.

TITLE SPONSOR: Be the one and only TITLE sponsor of the Boxing Ring for 1 year! We will put your logo in the center of the Boxing ring, promoting your company to all players, just like the big companies in major PPV and Cable televised boxing matches.
